author: daniellehrner
content: For me the biggest down side of 5806 is that it requires the EVM to be aware of transaction types, because of its exceptions with SSTORE for example. Further the concepts that smart contracts will behave differently depending on the transaction type is not very intuitive and makes DX worse.

author: big_tech_sux
content: what if the EVM were not aware of the transaction type? like 5806-type transaction just executes the code, exactly the same as if it were a smart contract
